00001 #ifndef HASH_SHARED_PTR_H_
00002 #define HASH_SHARED_PTR_H_
00003 
00004 #include <functional>
00005 #include <tr1/memory>
00006 
00007 using std::unary_function;
00008 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00009 
00010 template<class TC>
00011 struct hash_shared_ptr : public unary_function< const shared_ptr<TC>&, size_t> {
00012         size_t operator()(const shared_ptr<TC>& val) const{
00013                 return (size_t) val.get();
00014         }
00015 };
00016 
00017 #endif /*HASH_SHARED_PTR_H_*/
